name: Flag of South Korea
description:
South Korea is a country in East Asia. Its national flag is known as Taegeukgi.

The very first complete flag of r/Korea_Place. It was made together with Taiwanese allies such as r/placeTW and r/taiwanica. The flags of Korea and Taiwan were then expanded pixel by pixel until the proportion was 2:3. Both flags were taken over by Bangladesh and eventually Canada.
